author: Sëhrï
text:
I hate waiting
But I'll wait for you, even if I have to wait for a hundred years.

author: Sëhrï
text: “If you begin by sacrificing yourself to those you love, you will end by hating those to whom you have sacrificed yourself.”

author: Sëhrï
text:
Dear Girl's !
When u can't change the man just change the man...

author: Sëhrï
text: Gee ok https://t.co/CLN77woNXP

author: Sëhrï
text:
My pain may be the reason for somebody's
laugh, but my laugh must never be reason of
somebody's pain.

author: Sëhrï
text: Sometimes we just need a hug. A hug where someone wraps their arms around you so tight and reminds you that everything will be okay ...😞

author: Sëhrï
text: Feelings are temporary either good or bad, but that doesn't matter. What matter is, do what is good for you, your family, friends and all human beings.

author: Sëhrï
text:
We love ourselves
even after doing
thousand Mistakes..
Then how can 
we hate other 
for one Mistake..

author: Sëhrï
text: “You have such suffering eyes"

author: Sëhrï
text:
ہر چہ بِینی یار ہست اغیار نیست
غیرِ اُو جُز وہم و جُز پِندار نیست

Wherever I look, I see my beloved, and no one else.
Everyone except my beloved, has become an illusion.

author: Sëhrï
text: A moment's mistake caused a distance of a hundred years...

author: Sëhrï
text: "Your love conquered the land of my heart and exiled my intellect"...

author: Sëhrï
text: I feel like ending my life sometimes. I'm tired of everything....

author: Sëhrï
text:
-You scare me.!
•What? Why?
-You make me want a life I can't have. That's the scariest thing I've ever felt.

author: Sëhrï
text:
Somewhere between the night 
they met.. 
And the day he left..

author: Sëhrï
text: "Just when I knew life answers, they changed the questions"

author: Sëhrï
text: Tell me how can love be blind while I still see you even in your absence?

author: Sëhrï
text: Sorry @mohandis89

text: Dont flirt with me i have attachment issues...

author: Sëhrï
text: “Sometimes the dreams that come true are the dreams you never even knew you had.”

author: Sëhrï
text: Sharing your ugly pictures to someone without any embarrassment, that’s the bond ❤️
